format: A data frame with 1384 observations on the following 10 variables.
reference:
This is an extension of the study found in the mgus data set,
containing enrollment through 1994 and follow-up through 1999.
description:
Description
Natural history of 1341 sequential patients with monoclonal
gammopathy of undetermined significance (MGUS).  This is a superset of
the mgus data, at a later point in the accrual process
title: Monoclonal gammopathy data

parameters.futime: time until death or last contact, in months
parameters.ptime:
time until progression to a plasma cell
malignancy (PCM) or last contact, in months
parameters.mspike: size of the monoclonal serum splike
parameters.sex: a factor with levels F M
